# File lib/jabber4r/protocol.rb, line 557
557:       def Iq.gen_vcard(session, id, to)
558:         iq = Iq.new(session, id)
559:         iq.xmlns = "vcard-temp"
560:         iq.type = "get"
561:         iq.to = to
562:         return iq
563:         #return XMLElement.new("iq", {"type"=>"get", "id"=>id, "to"=>to}).add_child("query", {"xmlns"=>"vcard-temp"}).to_s
564:       end
